Title: XXXVIII.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Robert Levine, Tyler Van Patten (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy, Tom Hopper
Plot: Flint launches a final, desperate attack to destroy England's hold on Nassau; Silver makes an irreversible decision; Rackham confronts Rogers; Nassau is forever changed.
